metadata.description: In this first-ever Bumblebee miniseries written by Zander Cannon (Top Ten), after a shakeup in Autobot leadership, Bumblebee finds himself leading a group that believes him to be unprepared for the job. An opportunity to radically improve the Autobots reputation arises and he accepts despite his reservations, embarking on a clandestine mission for the human military to find and disable all remaining rogue robots.
metadata.name: Transformers: Bumblebee
